sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-autocomplete
    v-model="state"
    :fetch-suggestions="querySearchAsync"
    placeholder="请输入内容"
    @select="handleSelect"
  ></el-autocomplete>
</template>

<script>
import {getSuggest} from '../../api'
export default {
  name: "search",
  data() {
    return {
      suggests:[],
      state: "",
      timeout: null,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    loadAll() {
      getSuggest().then((response)=>{
        this.suggests=response.data.result.hots.map((item)=>{
          return Object.assign({'value':item.first}) 
        })
      });
    },
    querySearchAsync(queryString, cb) {
      var restaurants = this.restaurants;
      var results = queryString
        ? restaurants.filter(this.createStateFilter(queryString))
        : this.suggests;

        cb(results);
    },
    createStateFilter(queryString) {
      return (state) => {
        return (
          state.value.toLowerCase().indexOf(queryString.toLowerCase()) === 0
        );
      };
    },
    handleSelect(item) {
      console.log(item);
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.loadAll()
     console.log(this.suggests)
  },
};
</script>

<style spoed>
.el-autocomplete {
  line-height: 62px;
}
input[type="text"] {
  border-radius: 1.5em;
}
</style>
